Method Detail

continueWithCustomerSignatureOnReceipt

void continueWithCustomerSignatureOnReceipt(boolean verified)
Continues a transaction with a signature on the receipt after a respective actionRequired callback was called.

Parameters:
verified - Indicates if the signature matches the one on the card
Since:
2.3.0

continueWithCustomerSignature

void continueWithCustomerSignature(Bitmap signature,
                                   boolean verified)
Continues a transaction with a signature after a respective actionRequired callback was called.

Parameters:
signature - The digital signature of the customer.
verified - Indicates if the signature matches the one on the card
Since:
2.2.0

continueWithCustomerIdentityVerified

void continueWithCustomerIdentityVerified(boolean verified)
Continues a transaction with with a identity verification a respective actionRequired callback was called.

Parameters:
verified - Indicates if the identity was verified
Since:
2.2.0

continueWithSelectedApplication

void continueWithSelectedApplication(ApplicationInformation application)
Continue a transaction after an application selection actionRequired callback was called.

Parameters:
application - The application to use for the transaction
Since:
2.2.0

requestAbort

boolean requestAbort()
Requests an abort at the next possible moment. Repeated calls are ignored.

Returns:
If the transaction can be aborted.
Since:
2.0.0
